name: Gaze (Yee)
description:
Create a path by connecting the stars and collect the missing pieces of the constellations to unveil a secret message in the puzzle-platform game!

AD or Left and Right arrow keys to move.
Space Bar to jump.
Left mouse click to connect the stars.
Right mouse click to cancel or remove all the constellations.

Developed by Miguel Yee

Game created for the Global Game Jam 2021.
